title: dcminfo
description:
Output DICOM fields in human-readable format.



References:

csa.title: csa
csa.description: print all Siemens CSA fields (excluding Phoenix unless requested)

group.title: group
group.description: print field specified by the group & element tags supplied. Tags should be supplied as Hexadecimal (i.e. as they appear in the -all listing).

element.title: element
element.description: print field specified by the group & element tags supplied. Tags should be supplied as Hexadecimal (i.e. as they appear in the -all listing).

items.title: tag
items.description: print field specified by the group & element tags supplied. Tags should be supplied as Hexadecimal (i.e. as they appear in the -all listing).

tag.title: tag
tag.description: print field specified by the group & element tags supplied. Tags should be supplied as Hexadecimal (i.e. as they appear in the -all listing).

quiet.title: quiet
quiet.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

force.title: force
force.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

nthreads.title: nthreads
nthreads.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

key.title: key
key.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

value.title: value
value.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

items.title: config
items.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

config.title: config
config.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

help.title: help
help.description: display this information page and exit.

file.title: file
file.description: the DICOM file to be scanned.
